job_description: A soldier of the pre-war US Army.

description: A metallic steel pod large enough to house a singular human who is suspended in some kind of lime-green immulsion. Dare you open the container?

use_action.summon_msg: With a slight hiss the pod opens, and a weary soldier stumbles out of the pod to breathe fresh air for the first time in years.

yes: I have to rejoin my unit!
Why am I covered in goo?
Which way to the front line.
no: I have to rejoin my unit!
Why am I covered in goo?
Which way to the front line.

responses.text: Who are you, what happened to you?

dynamic_line.yes: I was in a battle. Yes, a battle. There was gunfire and explosions everywhere. People dying. I was scared but I had to keep on fighting. Then there was this blinding flash. The next thing I remember was seeing my body as if I was looking down at it from above. I heard the doctors say I was dead and then they threw my body onto a pile of other bodies. Some men came by and took my body to a laboratory. I heard them say something about trying to regenerate my body by immersing it in something called Biomed Gel.
